p: Cao et al. studied antigastric ulcer activity in vivo of guaiazulene derivatives on 221 mice divided into 28 groups [ 51]. They obtained guaiazulene sulfonate derivatives with a double sulphonylamino motif due to piperazine presence and studied their antigastric ulcer activity through an ethanol-induced gastric ulcer model method. All studied guaiazulene derivatives presented antigastric ulcer activity. It is worth noting that compounds 39â€“46, showed a significant reduction of gastric ulcers, whereas the most promising compounds 39, 42, 43 exhibited even better antiulcer activity than the first-line drug omeprazole (Fig. 10).
